summary: This mod adds more than 300 gems to the game that you can wear to improve various skills.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds more than 300 gems to the game that you can wear to improve various skills.

v1.3
-----
Changed from an esp to an esm since there has been problems with the gems not appearing at all.
Corrected the chipped diamond of resist shock that was giving resist magic instead.

The System
-----------------
The gems use enchantments that you can find on armors in the game, each enchantment can be find on two different gems, there is up to 5 slots for enchantments and there is 6 ranks of gems.Name system is from Diablo 3.

Gems:

Amethyst
Diamond
Emerald 
Garnet
Sapphire

Ranks:

example (chipped being the weakest):
	-Chipped Amethyst of Health
	-Flawed Amethyst of Health
	-Amethyst of Health
	-Flawless Amethyst of Health
	-Perfect Amethyst of Health
	-Radiant Amethyst of Health

Incompatibility
---------------
Can be incompatible with mods that use the following slots:45,49,54,56,60



Bugs/Issues
----------------

N/A

*If you find that you can wear 2 of the same gem or that they don\'t replace the good gem, please report it.

Requirement
------------------
patch 1.7

FAQ:
------

How does it work?

It is really simple, if you find one of those gems on your travel, simply go to your armor tab and click to equip.You will be able to wear only 1 of each gems at a time.

Where can I find them?

They can drop from various hostile npcs and there is a small chance of them spawning in some chests.At the moment, they aren\'t sold by vendor and you cannot craft them.
author: Littleork
